Question: These encounters have been colloquially named "The ____ Bowl".
Hints: This person completed 29 of 34 passes (85.7%) for 364 yards and 3 TDs.
Still, trailing by 6 late in the game this person led the Colts on a 77-yard TD drive to take a 21–20 lead.
It was the first game-winning drive of this person's career, as he hit Marcus Pollard with the game-winning TD pass.
